summary: The film tells the story of the blond "singing sailor" Hannes Kröger who works in a St. Pauli club on the Große Freiheit 7, and falls in love with a girl. But she prefers his rival Willem and Hannes returns to the sea.
cast: Hans Albers|Ilse Werner|Hans Söhnker|Hilde Hildebrand|Gustav Knuth|Günther Lüders|Ilse Fürstenberg|Ethel Reschke|Erna Sellmer|Kurt Wieschala|Helmut Käutner|Richard Nicolas|Maria Besendahl|Justus Ott|Gottlieb Reeck|Thea Thiele|Alfred Braun|Rudolf Koch-Riehl|Karl-Heinz Peters|Erwin Loraino|Kurt Felden|Eva Gotthardt|Hans Kornowicz|Alfred Maack|Friedrich Petermann|Aruth Wartan
title: Grosse Freiheit Nr. 7
